articles.description: Ashwin on Friday shared an unbroken seventh-wicket partnership of 52 runs with Dinesh Karthik, and later snared two wickets from his four overs.
articles.content: A clinical bowling display, led by the spin duo of Ravichandran Ashwin and Ravi Bishnoi, helped India outwit West Indies by 68 runs in the first Twenty20 of the five-match series on Friday. Ashwin, w… [+2611 chars]
